full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS KUN RIG RNAM PAR SNANG MDZAD KYI BDAG BSKYED NYAMS SU LEN TSUL NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES BCOM LDAN 'DAS KUN RIG RNAM PAR SNANG MDZAD KYI BZLAS BSGOM KYI TSUL GSAL ZHING BSDUS LA CHA TSANG BA 'DI NI LAM 'DI'I 'GRO TSUL LEGS PAR KHONG DU CHUD PA'I ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG DHARMA BHA DRAS SBYAR BYA'O, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,) ` 'DIR 'BAD DGE BAS DON GNYIS BSDUB PA YI, ,THABS MKHAS SPYOD PA YONGS SU RDZOGS BYAS TE, ,NGAN SONG GSUM SOGS NYAM THAG 'GRO BA KUN, ,SGROL LA RNAM SNANG CHEN POR BDAG GYUR CIG ,
